ygData.subject: Re: Hi
ygData.msgSnippet: When you first start up the game, you will see a list of servers that you can play on, and you choose which one you want your character to be on There all
ygData.messageBody:
When you first start up the game, you will see a
list of servers that you can play on, and you choose
which one you want your character to be on There all
exactly the same game, but your character would not be
able to move from server to server, its just to keep
things from getting too crowded. Actually theres a
couple of player vs player servers so those are a bit
different. other than that, the main difference is how many
people play on each one, some are busier than
others<br>Kind of like another game room like you said : )
